title: Resume
subtitle: A Journey of Growth, Impact, and Continuous Learning

job1.title: Tech Team Lead - Web Platform Fullstack
job1.description: Leading cross-functional teams to transform ambitious ideas into reality. Orchestrating OAuth implementation enhancements and crafting intuitive partner onboarding experiences that set new standards in fintech. Every day brings opportunities to mentor talented individuals and push the boundaries of what's possible with modern web technologies.

job2.title: Lead Frontend Developer
job2.description: Pioneered the development of innovative web applications that serve millions globally. Using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js, I led initiatives that balanced technical excellence with user delight. Mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and best practices that elevated our entire team's capabilities.

job3.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
job3.description: Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to ensure flawless payment flows and feature delivery for millions of users. Built and maintained high-performance mobile applications using React Native and Redux, always keeping user experience at the heart of every decision. Every feature shipped was a testament to our team's dedication to quality and reliability.

job4.title: Software Engineering Lecturer
job4.description: One of my greatest joys is guiding aspiring engineers as they take their first steps into the world of software development. Sharing real-world insights and practical wisdom gained from years in the industry, I help students build not just technical skills, but the confidence and mindset needed to thrive in modern web development.

education.title: Education
education.degree: BSc in Information Technology (Information Security System)
education.school: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
